Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Independence
ShortDescription: 12 Rsvlt rrtd WB via Rsvlt, Independence, Cngrss, Pulaski & Rsvlt; EB via Rsvlt, Pulaski, 5th-Harrisn, Cntrl Pk & Rsvlt due to blockage nr Rsvlt/Independence

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

  • Westbound via Roosevelt, Independence, Congress, Pulaski and Roosevelt.
  • Eastbound via Roosevelt, Pulaski, 5th-Harrison, Central Park and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
